0.1.0.name: connect20/facebook_activity_feed_module
0.1.0.description: Facebook Activity Feed Extension displays all the recent activities taking place on your website.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

0.1.1.name: connect20/facebook_activity_feed_module
0.1.1.description: Can Facebook influence your marketing strategy? Yes, using Facebook Activity Feed you can track all the activities of your customers. It can help you improve your marketing strategy by studying your customer behavior through this tool. Give your marketing strategy a new winning face through this extension!

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
